subject: [Ip-health] Clinical trials as public goods
body:
Many of you may be interested in the following article arguing for public
funding of clinical trials:


The Economists' Voice
Vol. 4 (2007) / Issue 1 /
The Case for Public Funding and Public Oversight of Clinical Trials
Available at: http://www.bepress.com/ev/vol4/iss1/art3
     Tracy R. Lewis, Duke University
     Jerome H. Reichman, Duke University
     Anthony D. So, Duke University
Abstract
     Clinical drug trials are public goods and should be publicly
funded to avoid undersupply, the suppression of adverse results and
other problems, according to Tracy R. Lewis, Jerome H. Reichman and
Anthony D. So.
